amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the Secretary of Health and Human Services certify to the Congress that at least 60% of individuals in the United States who are 25 years of age or older have private long-term care insurance before the CLASS Act would be repealed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section to ensure market penetration for private long-term care insurance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 264 (Roll no. 14).

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 264 (Roll no. 14).
